attributes.action: Amnesty for undocumented migrants who have lived in the UK for 12 years and more
attributes.additional_details:
The Home Office had previously indicated on 19 July 2021 that consideration should be given to a targeted “Amnesty” program. Nearly a year has passed and no further action has been taken.


Therefore this petition is calling for focused Amnesty for people entered in the UK through a legal route, later fell into undocumented category and lived in the UK for 12 + years.
attributes.background: The Government should implement an Amnesty program to undocumented migrants who have been living in the UK for past 12 years or more and who do not pose a risk to the UK and who have no criminal convictions.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar change:

Grant an amnesty for undocumented migrants after 10 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608918
